1_13MUkdCRgz1jXmufWdvJn5qgRrwhrWNYbK.body:
> Is all my code going to be available to everyone who downloads the site?

by code you mean html +css+javascript and all that need to be "open sourced" so the browser can render a page

any other file/software is threaded like a "attachment" so u can add a .exe file on your page and there are no rules for that, zeronet wont execute it or anything just distribute the file to all peers

>  How do permissions work?

there are none, the only "permission" is  the ability to sign every file and put their sha512 in content.json
